ValidationRule.description: If "Contribution Type" = Multiple, require the "Multiple Contribution Types" and "# of Allocations" fields to be entered.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Contribution_Type__c, "Multiple"), OR( ISBLANK( Multiple_Contribution_Types__c), ISBLANK( of_Allocations__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Multiple Contribution Types, # of Allocations cannot be blank for Contribution Type = Multiple.
